newsitem.title: USA: Advantage Bancorp to buy back stock.
newsitem.headline: Advantage Bancorp to buy back stock.

text.p: Advantage Bancorp Inc said Friday it will repurchase up to five percent of its stock during the six months beginning May 13, 1997.
Advantage has about 3.2 million shares outstanding, it said. The buyback is the tenth since Advantage became a public company in 1992.
The shares will be purchased at prevailing market prices from time to time depending upon market conditions, the company said.

Under its ninth buyback program which commenced in November, Advantage repurchased 76,100 shares at an average price of $34.02 a share, Advantage said. Since June of 1992, the company has repurchased a total of 1,072,000 shares at an average price of $21.56.
